title: a hero that curses enemies with debuffs until they die
body: a witch champion who can debuff champions like -30 attack damage making the laning phase harder .

{{champion:23}}
or lower their armor or debuff minions to make harder wave.but idk if this playstile fits league
There was a campaign against stat debuffs a few years ago so I can't see a new champion with a debuff focus.
